评论详情: I ordered this dress for my wedding dress. My husband and I had a small intimate wedding. This dress was a size large very fitted I’m 5”6 and weigh 165 . The dress came to my ankles.

This is a really stunning dress, although the lace is SO delicate and not very well stitched that even after just trying the product on, there was already a rip in the lace. It fit so wonderfully, just wish it was slightly better quality.

评论用户: Cute, but not worth the price
评论详情: Really cute but the material does bunch weird at my waist
Fit perfectly and looked beautiful. Great value for money.
Package came open with dress ripped
Wore this for my gender reveal. It was very romantic
The dress was comfortable (very stretchy), sleeves a bit tight. Dress definitely screams cheaply made. Ripped up before I even put it on. Kinda cute, but will be returning.

Ordered this dress and it came within one day. Was nervous at first because there were minimal reviews on the black version of the dress. However I’m so glad i bought it! Obsessed is a complete understatement. To preface I’m about 5’2 135 lbs and I carry a lot of my weight in the stomach and butt area. I do have shapewear on underneath it as well. This dress hugs my body in all the right places, it’s great for girls on the curvier side like myself. The length is also good for shorter girls. I don’t have heels on in my photos. Great quality as well. The underlayer is a little lighter than the original photo but that’s really my only complaint. Definitely recommend buying this!

I got this dress for our baby shower and I'm so glad it fit super well! It is stretchy enough to fit over my belly and not look too big either. The lace just makes it very elegant. The little jacket/arm thing is a bit weird but still looked great! I got a large- currently 150 lbs and 5'9

Ordered the medium white dress for my wedding reception next month. It was more vintage off white. The dress was stretchy and the length was perfect for me with heels on; I’m 5’1,133 lbs. However, the bolero didn’t fit right and the underpart was too tan where it drowned out the lace outer part. If the underpart was lighter or creamy tan with a fitter bolero it would be perfect because it wouldn’t outdo the lace. I had to return it unfortunately.
I am 5’4 and 120ish range. The small fit me very well and slim to my body but not too tight! It’s very beautiful!
Love the dress, stretch as well
I was scared the large wasn’t going to fit me because I’ma size 13/14 and it fits great because it’s a little stretchy. Not to stretchy but just enough! Beautiful

评论概述: A little tighter and shorter than expected.
评论详情: Bought for a witch costume and served its purpose, b it it was just a little too itchy and small to be practical for a reoccurring use

I wasn't expecting much but, I love this dress!  Hugs in all the right places and hides all the right places.  Mother of four and 49 years old so my tummy is not perfect.  This dress flatters my figure!! I'm 5' 4" 163lbs ordered the large, the length is great. Lace is soft and non itchy.  Great bargain!  My only complaint, the bolero jacket needs to be more.....it's pretty skimpy and a little more coverage with the jacket would be nice.  Hence the reason for 4 starts instead of 5.  I plan on wearing this for formal night on my cruise.
Loved the dress!! Simple and beautiful!! Soo many compliments but it’s not white! My veil didn’t match so I couldn’t wear it but the dress was beautiful!
I bought this for a wedding and can’t wait to wad it!! The fit is amazing and the price is even better. Looks and feels like a house of cb for a quarter of the price. Runs true to size…get it!

评论概述: Very nice fit - true to size
评论详情: Slightly delicate fabric but is an amazing dress especially for the price i got it. A little bit stretchy but mostly true to size. Beautiful for my engagement photos.

This is true to size but forgiving if a bit smaller or larger. It hangs nicely, the fabric isn’t super soft but for lace isn’t too itchy - seams are well done, very pretty and fit me well at 145lbs. Value is definitely there if you’re looking for a wedding-ish dress on a budget.

I am 5’3 about 115LBs. Both dresses are very flattering and beautiful. Material isn’t scratchy, it’s decent and comfortable enough to wear for hours. I adore the black dress more than the white dress only because of the minor detail difference. For example the straps in the black dress feel more secure meanwhile the white dress straps feel more fragile, the white dress is more neutral color than actually white and the black is gorgeous with the lace being black + neutral tan color. These dresses can be worn for many occasions just wash on delicate cycle and preferably air dry. Would purchase again for sure (:

This dress is beautiful but the one I got was damaged. I was excited when I put it on because it fit well but I noticed it had a very obvious sewn tear in it. I’m disappointed that the seller didn’t check the quality before sending it to me.

评论概述: Unfortunately a really poor quality D U P E
评论详情: Overall just not good quality at all unfortunately. The material is scratchy and the bolero fits poorly. I would not recommend.

Wow! This dress exceeded my expectations. Yes, it's not real lace, yes it's sort of like a For Love and Lemons FP dupe, but it's breathtaking!  I love the simple little bolero, though bear in mind, it won't stand up to a cycled wash.  The nude slip beneath the dress was comfortable and flattering, the V shaped back is exquisite and the little lace patterns, delicate.  The best part? The dress is stretchy and curve hugging without being unflattering. I'm a pretty round medium and the dress that arrived was small. Nonetheless I was able to zip my self in comfortably and walk around easily.  The gown is long but even as a petite woman of 4' 11" a pair of heels would allow me to walk around in this dress without the need to hem it. My only complaint concerns the straps, which are a bit...cheap looking and fragile seeming. Otherwise this FP dupe is perfect for most formal occasions and in a pinch, a courthouse wedding. The price is excellent for the design and quality. I just ordered myself one in black (sized Medium) and it fits as well, though slightly longer. LOVE LOVE LOVE!

I wore this dress for my rehearsal dinner. It was very comfortable and everyone loved it, lots of complements and looks. The material is soft and it held up well to washing in the machine. It is figure hugging and sexy.  I am 5’4 135lbs and ordered the small. Highly recommend!
Very cheap quality material. Dress was damaged and torn. Long sleeve lace was missing with dress. Do not recommend. Submitting a request for refund
